visualization_prompt: Generate a pie chart showing Earth's water distribution using pattern fills for enhanced accessibility
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains three categorical variables representing Earth's hydrospheric composition. Percentage values show saltwater dominance (97%) versus limited freshwater resources. Synthetic data follows established scientific consensus with exact percentages summing to 100%. The pie chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating redundant gridlines while maintaining proportional accuracy through angular encoding. Pattern fills implement Cairo's distinguishable性原则 for color vision deficiency support.
